alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 8:18AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Coleman County through 845 AM CDT... At 817 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silver Valley, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coleman, Valera, Glen Cove, Silver Valley and Hords Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
